H0.text: Genever is the old word for what alcoholic drink. Rum

H1.text: Genever is the old word for what alcoholic drink. Vodka

H2.text: Genever is the old word for what alcoholic drink. Whiskey

H3.text: Genever is the old word for what alcoholic drink. GIN

A4.text: Gin was developed in Britain after the introduction of jenever to the island.

A5.text: Geneva was the Anglicized name for jenever, a name brought back by English soldiers.

A6.text: The name gin is a shortened form of the older English word genever, related to the French word geni√®vre and the Dutch word jenever.
